document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Customary </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">part </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Trinket </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">confer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">helps </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">stimulate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">faith </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Lovers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">afar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">various </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">various </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">taste </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Clematis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">journeying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">far </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Presents </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Curl </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Electric </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Hair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">noting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">clematis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">also </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">known </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">"Traveler's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Joy," </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">suggested </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">poem </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">"composed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">accompany </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">gift </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">clematis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">blossom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">departing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">friend." </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Tis customary as we part
